entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 7 May 2023
